content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Customizable email reporting acknowledgments in Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection April 18, 2025—Administrators can customize the acknowledgment emails sent to end users when they report emails. This allows for personalized messages, enhancing communication and user experience when reporting false positive and false negative emails. Email and Collaboration Security → Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
